text: Home Improvement is an American sitcom starring Tim Allen. It originally aired from September 17, 1991, to May 25, 1999. It had 204 half-hour episodes in eight seasons. Cast: * Tim Allen as Tim Taylor * Patricia Richardson as Jill Taylor * Taran Noah Smith as Mark Taylor * Jonathan Taylor Thomas as Randy Taylor * Zachery Ty Bryan as Brad Taylor * Richard Karn as Albert * Earl Hindman as Wilson * Debbe Dunning as Heidi Keppert == Other websites == Category:1991 American television series debuts Category:1999 television series endings Category:1990s American television series Category:Television series set in San Francisco Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:English- language television programs Category:ABC network series
title: Home Improvement (TV series)
